name: Lighthouse (Batataglin, LucAS GF)
description:
"AWSD" to move 

"E" to interact

"Space" to Jump

"V" change camera perspective FPP/TPP

"TAB" Open objective menu 

Left click throw bomb

Right click place trap 

Be aware of the doggo!

Credits-

Bruno S. Bataglin - GameDesign/Programmer
